results.title: Successful pharmacological management of a child with compound heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia and review of the recent literature.
results.text_hl: He was diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@SFH@@@, initially treated with @CHEMICAL_Cholestyramine_Resin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002792 @@@colestyramine@@@ that was subsequently combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Sreedharan AV, Pek SLT, Tan TH, Tavintharan S, Yap F. Successful pharmacological management of a child with compound heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia and review of the recent literature. J Clin Lipidol. 2020 Sep-Oct;14(5):639-645. PMID: 32800790
citations.BibTeX: @article{32800790, title={Successful pharmacological management of a child with compound heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia and review of the recent literature.}, author={Sreedharan AV and Pek SLT and Tan TH and Tavintharan S and Yap F}, journal={J Clin Lipidol}, volume={14}, number={5}, pages={639-645}}

results.title: Simvastatin causes endothelial cell apoptosis and attenuates severe pulmonary hypertension.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol
results.text_hl: We conclude that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is effective in inducing apoptosis in hyperproliferative @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@pulmonary vascular lesions@@@ and could be considered as a potential drug for treatment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@SPH@@@.

citations.NLM: Taraseviciene-Stewart L, Scerbavicius R, Choe KH, Cool C, Wood K, Tuder RM, Burns N, Kasper M, Voelkel NF. Simvastatin causes endothelial cell apoptosis and attenuates severe pulmonary hypertension. Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol. 2006 Oct;291(4):L668-76. PMID: 16698853
citations.BibTeX: @article{16698853, title={Simvastatin causes endothelial cell apoptosis and attenuates severe pulmonary hypertension.}, author={Taraseviciene-Stewart L and Scerbavicius R and Choe KH and Cool C and Wood K and Tuder RM and Burns N and Kasper M and Voelkel NF}, journal={Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol}, volume={291}, number={4}, pages={L668-76}}

results.title: Sitagliptin and Simvastatin Interaction Causing Rhabdomyolysis and AKI
results.text_hl: We report a case of @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@severe@@@ @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@ (@DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@AKI@@@) requiring dialysis in a 69-year-old male who was recently started on @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ while on chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Patel C, Thompson C, Copley-Harris M, Hattab Y. Sitagliptin and Simvastatin Interaction Causing Rhabdomyolysis and AKI Case Rep Med. 2019;2019():2601537. PMID: 30936920
citations.BibTeX: @article{30936920, title={Sitagliptin and Simvastatin Interaction Causing Rhabdomyolysis and AKI}, author={Patel C and Thompson C and Copley-Harris M and Hattab Y}, journal={Case Rep Med}, volume={2019}, pages={2601537}}
